package.name: swissranger_camera
package.description:
Mesa Imaging Swissranger 3000/4000/4500 driver.
This is a port of the older ROS driver for SR devices that used the libusb API. This driver uses the newer libmesasr API (>= 1.0) that can be found at http://www.mesa-imaging.ch/drivers.php. This node is designed to work with the ROS image_pipeline with minimal dependencies.
Note: A compile time flag at the top of include/swissranger.h is currently used to switch back and forth between supporting SR3000 and SR4000/SR4500 devices.
This is a modified version of the original work from Radu B. Rusu and Patrick Beeson documented at http://wiki.ros.org/swissranger_camera.
package.author: Patrick Beeson, Radu Rusu
